hopp2021extended.title: The extended Moral Foundations Dictionary (eMFD): Development and applications of a crowd-sourced approach to extracting moral intuitions from text
hopp2021extended.author: Hopp, Frederic R and Fisher, Jacob T and Cornell, Devin and Huskey, Richard and Weber, Ren{\'e}
hopp2021extended.paperMotivationText: Extracting and analyzing moral content in text is a critical step toward understanding how the psychological influence of moral judgements unfolds at a global scale.
hopp2021extended.paperContributionText: The authors introduce the extended Moral Foundations Dictionary (eMFD). They explain how they generated it and demonstrate its validity in a range of experiments.
hopp2021extended.paperResultsText: Validation experiments demonstrate the usefulness of the eMFD.
hopp2021extended.validationOtherText: They tested whether scores obtained from eMFD allow to disinguish between newspapers from different political spectra (section "Partisan news framing").
